channel.title: == Auxy Forum Awards 2018 ==
channel.description:
Alright folks! We're back... polls got messed up last time. So here's take 2. It's that time where we tallied up all of your nominations and it's time to vote for your favorites in each of the 5 categories. Each person will get one vote, and you have until **January 12th** to cast your opinion. The top 10 nominees from each category were selected, with ties being resolved by order of nomination. So without further ado...
**Favorite Auxy Track of 2018**
[poll type=regular results=on_close] * Grim by Phluze * Odyssey by blackocean and Phluze * Kevinhood by Kayasho * Anti-Edo by Thrashie * finally free by blackocean * Bucket crew by tornait * Essence by Trey * Orion by Produk and Zeph * Star crossed remix by Fokkses * Marine by austin_haga [/poll]
**Favorite Auxy Producer of 2018**
[poll name=poll2 type=regular results=on_close] * aUstin_Haga * Cornea * Mr_Mooo * Kayasho * NotMiles * stereofield * Fokkses * Xiejra * Thrashie [/poll]
**Most Innovative Auxy Track of 2018**
[poll name=poll3 type=regular results=on_close] * 198X by Kayasho * Sherforest by Kayasho * Ripple by ToxicCaves64 * Viiper by NotMiles * Suncaster by MrSerpent * Takes me back by Otzsil * Slushii by Fokkses * Mothership by official_ivo and Xiejra * wuh by Phluze * Rain by GlacialViper [/poll]
**Most Unique Auxy Producer of 2018**
[poll name=poll4 type=regular results=on_close] * NotMiles * Southborne * Kayasho * Anechoik * Dj_La_Rocca * Insolidarity * Glacialviper * Mrserpent * Thrashie * Cornea [/poll]
**Most Supportive Auxy Producer of 2018**
[poll name=poll5 type=regular results=on_close] * Hum4n01d * stereofield * GlacialViper * eohr * Mr_Mooo * Aqua * Arimyth * Insolidarity * Hexx.Auxy * MrSerpent [/poll]

item.title: == Auxy Forum Awards 2018 ==
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
== Auxy Forum Awards 2018 — Winners! == Contest & Challenges
Auxy Forum Awards 2018 Winners The results are in! Let’s see who the top voted nominees are for the 2018 Auxy Forum Awards… BEST AUXY TRACK OF 2018 WINNER : Kevinhood by Kayasho - [Listen Now] (https://soundcloud.com/kayashokayasho/kevinhood-ep-2-kevinhood) 2 . Odyssey by blackocean and Phluze - Listen Now 3 . Anti-Edo by Thrashie - Listen Now 4th Equal. Essence by Trey - Listen Now 4th Equal. Orion by Produk and Zeph - Listen Now BEST AUXY PRODUCER OF 2018 W…

item.title: == Auxy Forum Awards 2018 ==
item.dc:creator: Thrashie
item.description:
Congrats Kayasho and Notmiles!!
glad to be apart of this.
not sure if ill be apart of this in the coming years considering im using a different Daw, but im glad at least i was able to be apart of this community and make at least some impact, even if it miight of been small.
Thank you all!! :’)

Read full topic

item.title: == Auxy Forum Awards 2018 ==
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
This means @anon38751485 is going to have a total of 6 unicorns. I wonder if this means there’s going to be a new symbol to keep things from getting too long after people’s names xD Congrats on the winners.

Read full topic

item.title: == Auxy Forum Awards 2018 ==
item.dc:creator: Mr_Mooo
item.description:
Congrats to Kayasho and NotMiles!
But also well done to everyone who got to the finals! You all did awesomely.

Thanks so much for most supportive! I can’t thank whoever voted me enough.

Read full topic
